import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' //Card import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState() const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) // const product = {} return ( <> Go back { loading ? : error ? {error} : (

{product.name}

 Price : ${product.price} Decription : {product.description} {`Status : ${product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}`} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty a )} ) } ) } export default ProductScreen
